text: "If I Were a Carpenter" is a 1966 folk song written by Tim Hardin and has been re-recorded by Bobby Darin and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1967, Johnny Cash featuring June Carter and won a Grammy Award in 1971, Four Tops, Johnny Hallyday and Robert Plant for his sixth studio album Fate of Nations ==References== Category:1966 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Johnny Hallyday songs Category:Johnny Cash songs Category:Bob Seger songs Category:Bobby Darin songs Category:Leon Russell songs Category:Burl Ives songs Category:Leif Garrett songs Category:Four Tops songs Category:Robert Plant songs
title: If I Were a Carpenter (song)
